messages.title: A New Whipps Cross Hospital
messages.content: 10 years ago, I helped STOP a Labour government from closing Whipps Cross Hospital. I've campaigned for many years and have resubmitted, and now a Conservative government has committed £400 million for a brand new hospital.

messages.title: Improving Local Transport
messages.content: I want to see CCTV on the Central Line and more trains starting from Woodford to ease overcrowding. I campaigned for new trains on the Chingford line – and they're coming.

messages.title: Support our High Streets
messages.content: I helped STOP Labour taking away 15 minutes free parking in Waltham Forest. I'm working on getting 30 minutes to help our local businesses.

messages.title: More Police
messages.content: The Conservatives have increased funding for the Met Police, which is getting 1,369 extra police officers in the first recruitment wave. I'll work to get a fair share for Chingford & Woodford Green to keep our streets safer.

messages.title: Stop Labour’s Tax on Driving
messages.content: I will fight Labour's plan to charge you £12.50 to drive to Whipps Cross Hospital. This will hit pensioners, low paid earners, shift workers, small businesses and even emergency vehicles.

messages.title: Protecting our Environment
messages.content: I will fight and oppose high-rise, high density development and overfishing, Highams Park, Woodford Green & South Woodford – and the waste incinerator at Edmonton.

issues.brexitEurope: LET'S GET BREXIT DONE, DELIVER DEMOCRACY – SO WE CAN GET ON WITH OUR PRIORITIES.
issues.environment: Protecting our Environment - I will fight and oppose high-rise, high density development and overfishing, Highams Park, Woodford Green & South Woodford – and the waste incinerator at Edmonton.

housing.content: Protecting our Environment - I will fight and oppose high-rise, high density development ...

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP in Chingford & Woodford Green for the last 27 years, I have always put the needs of my constituents first and foremost.

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured £400 million to rebuild Whipps Cross Hospital, getting extra funding for our schools and supporting the plan to put 20,000 more police on the streets.
